content: Now I would like to share with you more details on the development of each of all three business lines; including one, learning services and other, two content solutions and three, learning technology solutions during this past quarter. Non-GAAP net loss attributable to TAL, which excluded share-based compensation expenses was US$17.4 million compared with US$34.6 million in the same period of last year  US$0.4 million by the end of the first quarter, compared with US$187.7 million as of the end of February 28, 2022, representing an increase of 21.1%. As we continue to transform our business into a smart learning solutions provider, we're really encouraged by the trends demonstrated by our current business in the last quarter. As I mentioned last quarter, we look at our businesses in three buckets; learning services and other, content solutions and technology solutions. Please ask your question. Please ask your question. Please ask your question. Please ask your question. Please ask your question.
